mapper.select: select COUNT(userId) from thump where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and articleId = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
mapper.delete: delete from thump where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and articleId = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into thump(userId, articleId) values (#{userid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleid, jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into thump
userId,
articleId,
likeTime,
#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{liketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update thump
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
articleId = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
likeTime = #{liketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where likeId = #{likeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
